create.title: Create Template
create.subtitle: Create a template for people deploy a project with one click

name.title: Template Name
name.subtitle: How do you want people remember your amazing work?
name.error: Start and end with a letter, and only contain letters, numbers, and hyphens.

intro.title: Template Introduction
intro.subtitle: What does this template do? How can people use it?

variables.title: Template Variables
variables.subtitle: Template Variables are the variables that can be used in other services, you can set a service variable through [key: ${TEMPLATE_VARIABLE_KEY}] format.

services.title: Services
services.subtitle: How many services does your template integrated?

tags.title: Tags
tags.subtitle: Add tags for your template so that people can easily find it.

preview.title: Preview URL
preview.subtitle: If you have hosted a preview website, you can add it here so that people can see what your template looks like.

icon.title: Icon
icon.subtitle: Upload an icon for your template so that people can easily recognize it.

readme.title: Template README
readme.subtitle: Write a README for your template so that people can easily understand it.
